stronglyRegularGraphs

Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • stronglyRegularGraphs.FileHandler

  • public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class FileInput controls reading from a text file by opening the file, reading one line at a time, keeping track of the end of file, and handling I/O errors. Please note that I did not personally write the openFile, closeFile readLine methods (I got them from example code written by a professor), so I don't take credit for those.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Default constructor; assumes nothing is being passed in.
      FileHandler(java.lang.String fileName)
      This constructor sets the file name that is passed in.
